title: ♥️SPACIOUS HOME VIEW, BACKYARD IN BRENTWOOD ⛰
posting_body: CONTACT COREY for MORE INFO, PICS

*and we'll assist you through the entire process!*
This gorgeous, spacious, Bel Air home features 4 bedrooms, 3 bath, an incredible den, PLUS a maid's quarters that can serve as a 5th bedroom.
You will fall in love with this Mid-Century home!
It has walls of glass surrounding it with with natural light throughout.
The master bedroom even features an atrium in its in-suite bathroom.
The home is spacious and feels like you entered another era of comfort and luxury.
The large backyard offers panoramic views of the hillside and canyon.
The home is in the prestigious Bel Air Skycrest community which employs a 24-hour mobile security guard for extra safety.
It is right off Mulholland Dr., giving you an easy access to the Valley or the Westside.
Brought to you by Corey Trevor at Los Angeles Area - eXp Realty of California, Inc.
